fields.name: Definition
fields.description: An object that defines the blob inventory policy rule.

fields.name: Destination
fields.description: Container name where blob inventory files are stored. Must be pre-created.

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: Rule is enabled when set to true.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: A rule name can contain any combination of alpha numeric characters. Rule name is case-sensitive. It must be unique within a policy.
